snippet: After the State Department said that Russia had sent weapons to rebels in Ukraine, separatists using antiaircraft and heavy machine guns fired on a military transport plane in Luhansk, the Ukrainian Defense Ministry said.
abstract: State Department says Russia has sent tanks and other heavy weapons to separatists in Ukraine; statement supports accusations made by Ukrainian government.

byline.original: By ANDREW E. KRAMER and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer reported from Donetsk, and Michael R. Gordon from Washington.

lead_paragraph: After the State Department said that Russia had sent weapons to rebels in Ukraine, separatists using antiaircraft and heavy machine guns fired on a military transport plane in Luhansk, the Ukrainian Defense Ministry said.

headline.main: Russia Sent Tanks to Separatists in Ukraine, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Russia Sent Tanks to Ukrainian Separatists, U.S. Says
